sections.content: Cross Country Ski Trail Conditions as of February 21, 2026 –

The trail will be groomed today for classic and skate skiing. Due to the recent weather, there are some icy spots. The connector trail from the ski center to Bucks Run is no longer available.  Please know that you will have to walk to the start of the trail.  For your safety and the safety of our staff please adhere to Bucks Run hours.  Bucks Run is open Monday – Friday 12 pm – 7:45 pm and Saturday – Sunday 9 am – 7:45 pm, weather and conditions permitting.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Outstanding today - perfect groom over 28” hardpack , blue sky , sweet spot timing between 10:30 and 12:30 - simply wonderful!

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Bucks lives!  Still a connection all the way around.  And the tracks are still there, frozen but usable .Refreezing when I was out (3-4/30pm) with still a lot of spots that are still white and not boilerplate.  Some dirt showing thru in only a few spots.  There is debris from the wind but actually not as bad as I thought.  They should be able to groom it for decent conditions this weekend.  Hopefully it won’t bring up to much dirt.

nubsNob.liftsOpen: 8 chairlifts, Rope Tow and the Space Worm
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails will be groomed and tracked this morning.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Night Skiing is Tuesday thru Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 p.m.
nubsNob.comments: A heavy wet snow fell yesterday and it continues to snow this morning. The snow is machine groomed and in good condition with some fresh snow on top. Expect plenty of moisture in the snow today. NASTAR racing begins at 12:30 on Birch Run. The soup of the day is Golumpki. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with food service and an espresso bar. The lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. with an hour break at 4:30 to groom for night skiing. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
